casebody.data:
679 A.2d 1260 COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James HILL, Appellant. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Argued Jan. 22, 1996. Decided July 16, 1996.

*58Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM:

AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 1996, the above-captioned appeal is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
